company.name: GlobalLogic
company.description:
GlobalLogic is a leader in digital product engineering services. 

We help our clients design and build innovative products, platforms, and digital experiences for the modern world. By integrating strategic design, complex engineering, and vertical industry expertise -- we help our clients imagine what’s possible and accelerate their transition into tomorrow

project.description:
Have you ever wondered how much software is there to be tested in a washing machine? Or is there any software at all?

Imagine an embedded system divided into a number of nodes connected to the bus network, measuring e.g. pressure, temperature, water turbidity and drum movement in real time. Collected data is processed and used to control motors, heaters, valves, pumps, and fans. The system must react to a user's changing requests and, at the same time, adapt the execution of the program. It is easy to underestimate the complexity of this subject, but in reality, the testing of home appliances software is a challenging task. Therefore our testing process is well organized. We create and perform component tests and system tests, both manual and automatic.

Our customer is one of the biggest manufacturers of home appliances. The cooperation is very stable and successful and has lasted for more than 8 years. The development and testing of quality software for home appliance require a skillful team and a smart approach.
project.stack: Basic Python, English, QA, QA Automation
project.name: Software Verification Engineer - Home Appliance

project.description: The project is focused on quality assurance for telecommunication modules. Telecommunication modules are industrial-quality products which provide any system with the ability to communicate over a cellular network. This requires a lot of testing in different network conditions, environments, tests against simulators and protocol verification devices both on the cellular network side (GSM, UMTS, LTE, CDMA) and interface side (RS232, USB, SPI, I2C). Apart from manual tests, there is a lot of automated tests written mostly in Java or script languages which allow for fast verification without human intervention. Design and development of such tests is a very important part of activities which means a lot of software development. In case any issues are found department assists development with the identification of possible reasons, log gathering etc.
project.stack: Defect Reporting, ISTQB Foundation Level, Quality Assurance Testing, Telecommunication, Test Automation, Test Case Design

project.description:
Have you ever wondered how much software is there to be tested in a washing machine? Or is there any software at all?

Imagine an embedded system divided into a number of nodes connected to the bus network, measuring e.g. pressure, temperature, water turbidity and drum movement in real time. Collected data is processed and used to control motors, heaters, valves, pumps, and fans. The system must react to a user's changing requests and, at the same time, adapt the execution of the program. It is easy to underestimate the complexity of this subject, but in reality, the testing of home appliances software is a challenging task. Therefore our testing process is well organized. We create and perform component tests and system tests, both manual and automatic.

Our customer is one of the biggest manufacturers of home appliances. The cooperation is very stable and successful and has lasted for more than 8 years. The development and testing of quality software for home appliance require a skillful team and a smart approach.
project.stack: Basic Python, English, QA, QA Automation
project.name: Software Verification Engineer - Home Appliance

- Design and participate in end-user acceptance testing

- Participate in declarative system configuration when necessary
- Provide technical and functional expertise to project teams
- Participate in training content development and Administrator and end-user training delivery
 
Requirements:

- 3+ years of CRM experience and proven understanding of a full software development lifecycle
- 3+ years of hands-on experience with packaged applications, preferably Salesforce, implementing full project lifecycles
- Familiarity with Agile software delivery methodologies such as SCRUM and tools such as Jira and Rally
- Understanding the Salesforce product suite including Salesforce1, Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, App Cloud, Communities and AppExchange solutions
- Active Salesforce certifications or ability to achieve relevant certifications upon hire

matched_jobs.title: Project Manager
matched_jobs.description:
Duties and Responsibilities:

Process Governance -

- Define and apply the project management methodology according to the needs of a particular project
- Establish consistent project management processes within the project
- Create and maintain the project management documentation and revise it as appropriate
- Manage the project-related day-to-day operational activities
- Manage the client’s expectations; monitor and contribute to the increase of customer NPS; facilitate the project-related client communication at all levels
Performance and Efficiency -

- Lead the software development teams and direct their activities so that the project is run within the constraints of scope, schedule, budget, and resources
- Implement and use the best-in-class delivery metrics to reach and maintain a high level of performance
- Ensure the project-related metrics, such as NPS, ESAT, and the turnover rate, are at the target level
- Ensure the effectiveness of the project team structure
Finance -

- Assist the Delivery Manager/Delivery Director in ensuring the project revenue and profit targets are achieved
- Facilitate the minimization of the project costs through effective expense management and resource management
Human Resources -

- Create and manage the project team structure to achieve ultimate project goals and objectives
- Keep the project team well informed about the changes within the company and general corporate news; act as the interface between the company departments
- Motivate, guide, coach and encourage direct subordinates
- Effectively manage the project staffing
 
Requirements:

- At least 3-4 years of proven experience in project management
- Experience of taking ownership of all aspects of the project, such as budget, scope, schedule, and quality
- Experience of working with the U.S. or European companies
- Extensive experience with human resources management
- Proven experience in team building and team management
- Knowledge of the SDLC
- Understanding of how a software development company works
- Knowledge of traditional and Agile project management methodologies
- Proficiency in using the project management tools
- English level - Upper-Intermediate and above
- Negotiation, influencing, motivation, and conflict resolution skills
- Result and client orientation

- Are a person with a solid tech background, who has a hands-on insight into how web and mobile applications work

- Have an understanding of Agile, or more specifically - Scrum

company.name: Monterail
company.description: When we started in 2010, we were just a tight group of people dedicated to the craft of product building. Our attitude has not changed—but since then, we’ve grown to be a team of 80+ developers and designers with every skill web software needs to be successful. From the first concept to the grand release.

project.description:
We are Monterail. A close-knit team of 80+ experts offering premium development services for startups and businesses. We became the company of choice for many international clients in the UK, Switzerland, Germany, Austria, the Middle East, and the United States. Year after year we’ve been working hard to grow our team and our business. As a result, we are honoured to be recognised as technology experts and one of the fastest growing companies in Poland and Europe by Deloitte, Financial Times, Clutch and Puls Biznesu.

We are looking for a Project Manager to help us achieve that goal by maintaining strong and healthy relationships with our clients, ensuring timely delivery of our services, coordinating the workflow of the project teams and taking care of their well-being.

 Coordinating tribe meetings

- Supporting the company’s strategic growth - diagnosing the areas in need of development and active participation in introducing the necessary changes

We specialize in sophisticated integration projects trying to connect hardcore IT with good product design and UX.

project.description: Last year, we changed our structure, inspired by Spotify, among others. We divided into ca. 20-people teams (tribes) that are not dispersed after completing a project, specializing usually in a chosen technology, occupying one room, working together on the best practices and sharing knowledge, leaded by a Tribe Master.

Process Governance -

- Define and apply the project management methodology according to the needs of a particular project

- Manage the project-related day-to-day operational activities
- Manage the client’s expectations; monitor and contribute to the increase of customer NPS; facilitate the project-related client communication at all levels
Performance and Efficiency -

- Lead the software development teams and direct their activities so that the project is run within the constraints of scope, schedule, budget, and resources
- Implement and use the best-in-class delivery metrics to reach and maintain a high level of performance
- Ensure the project-related metrics, such as NPS, ESAT, and the turnover rate, are at the target level
- Ensure the effectiveness of the project team structure

- Assist the Delivery Manager/Delivery Director in ensuring the project revenue and profit targets are achieved
- Facilitate the minimization of the project costs through effective expense management and resource management
Human Resources -

- Create and manage the project team structure to achieve ultimate project goals and objectives
- Keep the project team well informed about the changes within the company and general corporate news; act as the interface between the company departments
- Motivate, guide, coach and encourage direct subordinates
- Effectively manage the project staffing

- Proven experience in team building and team management
- Knowledge of the SDLC

project.description:
Have you ever wondered how much software is there to be tested in a washing machine? Or is there any software at all?

Imagine an embedded system divided into a number of nodes connected to the bus network, measuring e.g. pressure, temperature, water turbidity and drum movement in real time. Collected data is processed and used to control motors, heaters, valves, pumps, and fans. The system must react to a user's changing requests and, at the same time, adapt the execution of the program. It is easy to underestimate the complexity of this subject, but in reality, the testing of home appliances software is a challenging task. Therefore our testing process is well organized. We create and perform component tests and system tests, both manual and automatic.

Our customer is one of the biggest manufacturers of home appliances. The cooperation is very stable and successful and has lasted for more than 8 years. The development and testing of quality software for home appliance require a skillful team and a smart approach.
project.stack: Basic Python, English, QA, QA Automation
project.name: Software Verification Engineer - Home Appliance

company.name: GlobalLogic

project.description: The project is focused on quality assurance for telecommunication modules. Telecommunication modules are industrial-quality products which provide any system with the ability to communicate over a cellular network. This requires a lot of testing in different network conditions, environments, tests against simulators and protocol verification devices both on the cellular network side (GSM, UMTS, LTE, CDMA) and interface side (RS232, USB, SPI, I2C). Apart from manual tests, there is a lot of automated tests written mostly in Java or script languages which allow for fast verification without human intervention. Design and development of such tests is a very important part of activities which means a lot of software development. In case any issues are found department assists development with the identification of possible reasons, log gathering etc.
project.stack: Defect Reporting, ISTQB Foundation Level, Quality Assurance Testing, Telecommunication, Test Automation, Test Case Design

project.description: The project is focused on quality assurance for telecommunication modules. Telecommunication modules are industrial-quality products which provide any system with the ability to communicate over a cellular network. This requires a lot of testing in different network conditions, environments, tests against simulators and protocol verification devices both on the cellular network side (GSM, UMTS, LTE, CDMA) and interface side (RS232, USB, SPI, I2C). Apart from manual tests, there is a lot of automated tests written mostly in Java or script languages which allow for fast verification without human intervention. Design and development of such tests is a very important part of activities which means a lot of software development. In case any issues are found department assists development with the identification of possible reasons, log gathering etc.
project.stack: Defect Reporting, ISTQB Foundation Level, Quality Assurance Testing, Telecommunication, Test Automation, Test Case Design

project.description: The project is focused on quality assurance for telecommunication modules. Telecommunication modules are industrial-quality products which provide any system with the ability to communicate over a cellular network. This requires a lot of testing in different network conditions, environments, tests against simulators and protocol verification devices both on the cellular network side (GSM, UMTS, LTE, CDMA) and interface side (RS232, USB, SPI, I2C). Apart from manual tests, there is a lot of automated tests written mostly in Java or script languages which allow for fast verification without human intervention. Design and development of such tests is a very important part of activities which means a lot of software development. In case any issues are found department assists development with the identification of possible reasons, log gathering etc.

company.name: Infermedica
company.description:
Infermedica is the most advanced symptom checker and clinical decision support platform. Our medical diagnostic engine delivers thousands of insights every day.

We are working on industry biggest challenges: true artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning, natural language processing (NLP) and chatbots. Our core technology is science-driven

project.description:
As a Data Scientist at Infermedica, you will be responsible for designing complex algorithms intending to mimic reasoning capabilities of real human diagnosticians.

What kind of problems should you expect? For instance we’ve recently built a predictive model that determines emergency level for a given set of symptoms. Thanks to that, a patient knows whether he/she can stay at home and rest or look for immediate medical assistance. What else? We’ve gathered huge amounts of publicly available medical records and turned it into a valuable source of relations between diseases and symptoms.

On a day-to-day basis you will work on the prototyping, analysis, implementation and improving of the reasoning engine. You’ll join the growing team of data scientists and will collaborate with medical doctors and developers. We solve problems from A to Z. Starting with finding data sources, through data cleaning, modeling, communicating results with visualizations and interactive reports, up to scalable implementations. You will be able to see the impact of your efforts almost immediately.
project.name: Data Scientist

project.description: The project is focused on quality assurance for telecommunication modules. Telecommunication modules are industrial-quality products which provide any system with the ability to communicate over a cellular network. This requires a lot of testing in different network conditions, environments, tests against simulators and protocol verification devices both on the cellular network side (GSM, UMTS, LTE, CDMA) and interface side (RS232, USB, SPI, I2C). Apart from manual tests, there is a lot of automated tests written mostly in Java or script languages which allow for fast verification without human intervention. Design and development of such tests is a very important part of activities which means a lot of software development. In case any issues are found department assists development with the identification of possible reasons, log gathering etc.
project.stack: Defect Reporting, ISTQB Foundation Level, Quality Assurance Testing, Telecommunication, Test Automation, Test Case Design

Duties and Responsibilities:

- Result Orientation –  as a member of our Quality team you will contribute to the holistic effort of delivering high-quality software on time
- Analysis & Case Writing Usage – you will be responsible for the translation of high-level functional requirements (User Stories) into detailed Use Cases and Test plans
- Requirements Definition Process Driving - you will be the catalyst to invoke feedback and sign-off on Use Cases and Test Cases from all relevant stakeholders; typically, but not limited to SCRUM Master, Developers, Product Owner and fellow QA members
- Hands-On Testing – you will also be responsible for performing hands-on new feature and function testing to support the SCRUM team’s development efforts; this will happen on tight time lines while also writing test cases and regression testing
  
Requirements:

- Experience in testing client-server software

- Be familiar with the Agile methodology and continuous integration

matched_jobs.title: Principal Manual QA
matched_jobs.description:
Requirements:

- 6+ years of work experience in software testing (enterprise applications is a plus)
- Functioned as team-lead on QA projects, leading small teams of 3-5 resources
- Highly experienced with QA methodologies, processes and tools
- Experience setting up quality processes/driving quality initiatives on a project level
- Strong understanding of web-based technologies
- Excellent understanding of quality assurance and product quality
- Ability to perform tests against Web applications, both front-end UI as well as back-end databases, application servers, and services
- Ability to plan, coordinate, and execute a testing strategy
- Strong knowledge of SQL and relational theory
- Upper intermediate level of English in both writing and speaking
- Self-starter with excellent communication and interpersonal skills, as well as a strong attention to detail

Responsibilities:

- Provide functional and technical expertise within a product domain area
- Anticipate risksimpact associated with feature development
- Work as a full partner with the development team to include all hooks and debug tools that will help to drive quality.
- Participate in all planning and estimation practices.
- Create and execute test strategies with an emphasis on balancing the need for thorough documentation of tests with the need to move quickly and agilely
- Produce status reports and quality metrics
- Contribute to establishing, revising and verifying quality standards, processes, and procedures.
- Сreate and analyze testing artifacts - test plans, test cases, and user scenarios.
- Maintain pre-existing (regression) test cases to keep current as new enhancements are introduced.
- Interact with the customer regarding ongoing activities (possible business trips to the US)
- Mentoring newcomers or junior grades
- Lead a Scrum QA team (2-4), onboard newcomers and provide training to junior grades
- Suggest and provide leadership on implementing QA process enhancements

company.name: GlobalLogic
company.description:
GlobalLogic is a leader in digital product engineering services. 

We help our clients design and build innovative products, platforms, and digital experiences for the modern world. By integrating strategic design, complex engineering, and vertical industry expertise -- we help our clients imagine what’s possible and accelerate their transition into tomorrow

project.description:
Our Client is a transnational company that owns numerous products within the Finance domain. One of the largest, B2B electronic payment network, is integrating at the moment with several other Banking products belonging to Client and we are looking for 3 new Scrum Teams to support extension of the existing payments solution, its integration with other lines of businesses, migration of old core to modern technologies and building new functionality at the top. Existing application is one of the winners of US market at the moment and we are looking for market expansion with the merge that is happening.

From technologies perspective, the old core is written on Java 7, reporting engine is Crystal Reports (to be moved to Jasper); Front End is a mixture of Dojo and J2EE – the expectation is to bring this to the stack outlined above in the requirements.

We are young and enthusiastic team, tightly integrated with the Customer and empowered for business and technical decisions. We support flexibility with working hours and always find time to have some fun. There are business trips to Client location (the USA, East coast)  and there are always many challenges and opportunities to grow.
project.name: Principal Manual QA

matched_jobs.description:
Requirements

- Minimum 1 year of relevant commercial experience in software verification (preferably embedded projects/telecommunication)
- Knowledge of Java  SE/ME or Python, Embedded Linux
- Good English – spoken and written 
- Ability to take responsibility for tasks realization and high-quality assurance
- Effective communication skills
- Fulfilling commitments and willingness to show initiative

Responsibilities

- Software verification of embedded systems (telecommunication)
- Manual testing and test automation, test case design
- Execution of tests on various levels (system, integration, acceptance)
- Working with hardware testing equipment (protocol testers, network simulators)
- Defect reporting and investigation

company.name: GlobalLogic
company.description:
GlobalLogic is a leader in digital product engineering services. 

We help our clients design and build innovative products, platforms, and digital experiences for the modern world. By integrating strategic design, complex engineering, and vertical industry expertise -- we help our clients imagine what’s possible and accelerate their transition into tomorrow

project.description: The project is focused on quality assurance for telecommunication modules. Telecommunication modules are industrial-quality products which provide any system with the ability to communicate over a cellular network. This requires a lot of testing in different network conditions, environments, tests against simulators and protocol verification devices both on the cellular network side (GSM, UMTS, LTE, CDMA) and interface side (RS232, USB, SPI, I2C). Apart from manual tests, there is a lot of automated tests written mostly in Java or script languages which allow for fast verification without human intervention. Design and development of such tests is a very important part of activities which means a lot of software development. In case any issues are found department assists development with the identification of possible reasons, log gathering etc.
project.stack: Defect Reporting, ISTQB Foundation Level, Quality Assurance Testing, Telecommunication, Test Automation, Test Case Design
project.name: Software Tester For Telecommunication

project.description: The project is focused on quality assurance for telecommunication modules. Telecommunication modules are industrial-quality products which provide any system with the ability to communicate over a cellular network. In case any issues are found department assists development with the identification of possible reasons, log gathering etc.

project.description: The project is focused on quality assurance for telecommunication modules. Telecommunication modules are industrial-quality products which provide any system with the ability to communicate over a cellular network. This requires a lot of testing in different network conditions, environments, tests against simulators and protocol verification devices both on the cellular network side (GSM, UMTS, LTE, CDMA) and interface side (RS232, USB, SPI, I2C). Apart from manual tests, there is a lot of automated tests written mostly in Java or script languages which allow for fast verification without human intervention. Design and development of such tests is a very important part of activities which means a lot of software development. In case any issues are found department assists development with the identification of possible reasons, log gathering etc.
project.stack: Defect Reporting, ISTQB Foundation Level, Quality Assurance Testing, Telecommunication, Test Automation, Test Case Design

project.description: The project is focused on quality assurance for telecommunication modules. Telecommunication modules are industrial-quality products which provide any system with the ability to communicate over a cellular network. This requires a lot of testing in different network conditions, environments, tests against simulators and protocol verification devices both on the cellular network side (GSM, UMTS, LTE, CDMA) and interface side (RS232, USB, SPI, I2C). Apart from manual tests, there is a lot of automated tests written mostly in Java or script languages which allow for fast verification without human intervention. Design and development of such tests is a very important part of activities which means a lot of software development. In case any issues are found department assists development with the identification of possible reasons, log gathering etc.

project.description:
LEADER
APPLY
About Company:

SoftServe is a leading technology solutions company specializing in software product and application development and services.

Our mission is to be a valuable partner for our clients (from start-ups to large enterprises) who represent different domains e.g. healthcare, retail, enterprise, automotive, education etc. We measure our success by our clients’ success.

We are +5000 team across the world of most technologies and roles in IT and today we are looking for a Project Manager to join our Wrocław team.
project.name: Project Manager

matched_jobs.title: Project Coordinator
matched_jobs.description:
Responsibilities:

- Manage the project with a total team size of up to 15 project members
- Maintain the communication between SoftServe and the Client
- Facilitate the engagement and proposal phases when it comes to new opportunities and projects
- Shape and manage the Client’s expectations
- Ensure the project deliverables conform to the budget, scope, schedule, and quality during all phases of the SDLC: initiation, analysis and design, execution, monitoring and control, and completion
- Create and manage the project team structure to achieve ultimate project goals and objectives
- Keep the project team well informed about the changes within the company and general corporate news; act as the interface between the company departments
  
Requirements:

- 1-2 years of experience in project management
- Graduated from IT faculty or experience in IT company
- Knowledge of the software development lifecycle
- Understanding of how a software development company works
- Knowledge of traditional and Agile project management methodologies
- Knowledge of the project pricing model and billing procedures
 - Knowledge of the project and budget estimation techniques
- Proficiency in using the project management tools
- Cross-cultural awareness
- Very good level of English

company.name: SoftServe
company.description:
SoftServe is a leading technology solutions company specializing in software product and application development and services.
Our mission is to be a valuable partner for our clients (from start-ups to large enterprises) who represent different domains e.g. healthcare, retail, enterprise, automotive, education etc.

project.description: We are the Company of +5000 employees across the world of most technologies and roles in IT and today we are looking for a Project Coordinator to join our team.

matched_jobs.title: Senior Project Manager
matched_jobs.description:
- Managing a team of professionals (software developers, software testers, business analysts), taking care of their growth, feedbacks, promotions and contracts
- Creating a climate for cooperation and development within your tribe
 Coordinating tribe meetings
- Active cooperation with other Tribe Masters
- Effective human resources allocation
- Supporting the company’s strategic growth - diagnosing the areas in need of development and active participation in introducing the necessary changes
 

This offer is for you, if you have:

- Experience (at least 4 years) in running IT projects, including project implementations from analysis up to release phase (preferably e-commerce)
- Practical knowledge of the management methodologies
- Experience in using Agile methodologies
- Ability to plan and organize work
- Ease at establishing business connections
- Communication and negotiation skills
 - Creativity, independence, responsibility and initiative
- Fluent English (at least B2)
- Fluent German would be a big plus

company.name: Divante
company.description: We are a Software House from Europe, headquartered in Poland and employing about 150 people. Our core competencies are built around Magento, Pimcore and bespoke software projects (we love Symfony3, Node.js, Angular, React, Vue.js). We specialize in sophisticated integration projects trying to connect hardcore IT with good product design and UX.

project.description: Last year, we changed our structure, inspired by Spotify, among others. We divided into ca. 20-people teams (tribes) that are not dispersed after completing a project, specializing usually in a chosen technology, occupying one room, working together on the best practices and sharing knowledge, leaded by a Tribe Master.
project.name: Senior Project Manager

matched_jobs.title: Recruiter
matched_jobs.description:
Responsibilities: 

- Perform full recruiting lifecycle base on recruiting process
- Strategize with recruitment team members and/or hiring managers to understand position requirements and talent needs
- Analyze external labor market compared with company needs on permanent basis and proactively respond to it
- Research and recommend new sources for active and passive candidate
- Use social and professional networking sites to identify candidates
- Participate actively in marketing internal and external activities
- Perform other tasks as assigned by manager or senior management in the business (may be related to different HR areas e.g. HR Operations, employer branding, internal events, CSR) 
  
Requirements: 

- At least 1 year of experience in full lifecycle recruiting in the IT industry
- Understanding of software development company functioning and life cycle recruitment process
- Knowledge of Polish labor law
- MS Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint)
- Education - bachelor degree and above 
 

Skills and Abilities: 

- Good command of English language (both speaking and writing)
- Good communication and presentation skills
- Client and result orientation
- Well-developed negotiation skills
- High logical, analytical thinking skills
- Attention to detail and ability to maintain confidential information
- Excellent time and self-management work prioritization skills
- Can-do, proactive and problem-solving attitude

company.name: SoftServe
company.description:
SoftServe is a leading technology solutions company specializing in software product and application development and services.
Our mission is to be a valuable partner for our clients (from start-ups to large enterprises) who represent different domains e.g. healthcare, retail, enterprise, automotive, education etc.

project.description:
oftServe Poland has huge plans in Wrocław, Białystok and Gliwice offices for 2018. To meet with these goals we would like to start cooperation with a person interested in areas such as IT recruitment, Marketing and HR. 

We are looking for someone for whom recruitment is a passion, candidate - a challenge. A Person who is full of ideas to be used for marketing purposes. 

If you a person who appreciates independence at work and is driven by success, definitely we are the place where you'll want to stay for a long time.
project.name: Recruiter

matched_jobs.title: Talent Sourcer
matched_jobs.description:
Your responsibilities will include:

- Creating a professional image of LiveChat by taking care of the Candidate Experience and our Employer Branding,
- Searching for candidates using variety of channels and tools,
- Building a long-term relationship with candidates,
- Coordinating the entire recruitment process with Recruiters,
- Suggesting and implementing new ideas for acquiring candidates.

What we’re looking for:

- 1+ years of experience in recruitment, including areas of: IT, marketing, e-commerce, customer support,
- Non-standard approach to attract the best talents,
- Good practical knowledge of Boolean and sourcing tools
- Direct search and headhunting experience will be an asset,
- Fluent English,
- Ability to work in a team as well as independently,
- Can-do attitude and self-reliance in day-to-day tasks.

company.name: LiveChat
company.description:
We’re a team of over 90 passionate people developing and supporting the most efficient and easy-to-use live chat software for business. What we enjoy the most is seeing our customer’s business grow with the help of our product
Our mission is to deliver fast and simple communication and to make the online sales process easier.

project.description: Doesn’t matter how they call you: headhunter, researcher, recruiter or skin hunter, if talent sourcing is your superpower, let’s join LiveChat! We’re looking for you to help us build the best team in the whole universe!
project.name: Talent Sourcer

project.name: Competence Manager

matched_jobs.title: Project Manager
matched_jobs.description:
Duties and Responsibilities:

Process Governance -

- Define and apply the project management methodology according to the needs of a particular project
- Establish consistent project management processes within the project
- Create and maintain the project management documentation and revise it as appropriate
- Manage the project-related day-to-day operational activities
- Manage the client’s expectations; monitor and contribute to the increase of customer NPS; facilitate the project-related client communication at all levels
Performance and Efficiency -

- Lead the software development teams and direct their activities so that the project is run within the constraints of scope, schedule, budget, and resources
- Implement and use the best-in-class delivery metrics to reach and maintain a high level of performance
- Ensure the project-related metrics, such as NPS, ESAT, and the turnover rate, are at the target level
- Ensure the effectiveness of the project team structure
Finance -

- Assist the Delivery Manager/Delivery Director in ensuring the project revenue and profit targets are achieved
- Facilitate the minimization of the project costs through effective expense management and resource management
Human Resources -

- Create and manage the project team structure to achieve ultimate project goals and objectives
- Keep the project team well informed about the changes within the company and general corporate news; act as the interface between the company departments
- Motivate, guide, coach and encourage direct subordinates
- Effectively manage the project staffing
 
Requirements:

- At least 3-4 years of proven experience in project management
- Experience of taking ownership of all aspects of the project, such as budget, scope, schedule, and quality
- Experience of working with the U.S. or European companies
- Extensive experience with human resources management
- Proven experience in team building and team management
- Knowledge of the SDLC
- Understanding of how a software development company works
- Knowledge of traditional and Agile project management methodologies
- Proficiency in using the project management tools
- English level - Upper-Intermediate and above
- Negotiation, influencing, motivation, and conflict resolution skills
- Result and client orientation

matched_jobs.title: Product Owner
matched_jobs.description:
Requirements:

- Industry related experience 3+ years (software engineering projects), knowledge of software development lifecycle and software development methodologies including 2+ years in the business analysis in different projects and domain areas
- Experience as a PO for 1 or multiple teams in a scalable Agile environment (at least 1 proven project) 
- Strong knowledge in practices and techniques of business analysis, requirements gathering (Elicitation - Interview, document analysis) and solutions assessment including gap analysis and root cause analysis
- Knowledge of Agile Scrum approach to backlog creating and maintenance,  requirements management tools
- Ability to produce solid documentation: SRS/Vision/Training documentation
- Ability to maintain knowledge base on the business needs
- Ability to create clear and concise requirements documentation (English writing, diagrams, UML, BPMN)
- Understanding requirements documentation needed on different stages of requirements processing (Case Study, Specification, RTM, Test Case, User Manual)
- Fluent English (comprehensive written and verbal communication)
- Experience in finance software domain would be a plus

Responsibilities:

- Collaborate with Stakeholders, end users and Subject Matter Experts to gather and document business and functional requirements
- Create/maintain project knowledge base
- Document mid/ low-level requirements, update Jira stories (including data flows modeling, UI sketches)
- Perform gap analysis between high level and low-level requirements
- Participate in demo and training preparation
- Draft and maintain use cases or other supporting documentation for enhancements or new features

company.name: GlobalLogic
company.description:
GlobalLogic is a leader in digital product engineering services. 

We help our clients design and build innovative products, platforms, and digital experiences for the modern world. By integrating strategic design, complex engineering, and vertical industry expertise -- we help our clients imagine what’s possible and accelerate their transition into tomorrow

project.description: We are looking for experienced Product Owner to support software projects for the financial domain. Our product provides customers with the ability to manage payments to third-party lawyers and law firms. Join us and create software that connects your world!
project.stack: Agile, Business Analyst, Large Scale Scrum, Product Owner, Requirements analysis
project.name: Product Owner

matched_jobs.title: Project Manager
matched_jobs.description:
- Are a person with a solid tech background, who has a hands-on insight into how web and mobile applications work
- Experienced in project management (though, we don’t care how many years you’ve done that - it’s your skills and knowledge that interest us)
- Have an understanding of Agile, or more specifically - Scrum
- Highly communicative and able to find common language with people of diverse background and personality
- Show huge deal of pro-activeness and determination to help your team achieve common goals
- Fluent in spoken and written English
- Have outstanding planning and analytical skills
- Great team player and facilitator
- Stress-resistant and able to manage other people expectations

You will:

- Set-up and lead project teams composed of Backend, Front-End and Full-Stack Developers, supported by QA Specialists and Designers to help them create awesome software as per our clients requirement
- Be responsible for the full life-cycle of product development
- Collaborate with our design team on getting the best out of the design process by asking our clients the right questions
- Organize project workflow and facilitate regular team meetings: stand-ups, sprint plannings, retros etc.
- Take ownership of the project’s budget, scheduling and delivery
- Support our BD team in building and maintaining long-term relationships as well as kick-off brand new projects from incoming clients and take care of their satisfaction from working with us
- Work closely with a Tech Lead to tackle the technological complexity, create the project backlog and prioritize it
- Live and breathe highly iterative lean & Agile methodologies, analyze progress against schedules identifying key issues and risksHave a dedicated time for self-development

company.name: Monterail
company.description: When we started in 2010, we were just a tight group of people dedicated to the craft of product building. Our attitude has not changed—but since then, we’ve grown to be a team of 80+ developers and designers with every skill web software needs to be successful. From the first concept to the grand release.

project.description:
We are Monterail. A close-knit team of 80+ experts offering premium development services for startups and businesses. We became the company of choice for many international clients in the UK, Switzerland, Germany, Austria, the Middle East, and the United States. Year after year we’ve been working hard to grow our team and our business. As a result, we are honoured to be recognised as technology experts and one of the fastest growing companies in Poland and Europe by Deloitte, Financial Times, Clutch and Puls Biznesu.

We are looking for a Project Manager to help us achieve that goal by maintaining strong and healthy relationships with our clients, ensuring timely delivery of our services, coordinating the workflow of the project teams and taking care of their well-being.
project.name: Project Manager

matched_jobs.title: Senior Devops Engineer
matched_jobs.description:
Requirements:

- Solid experience in identifying operational issues and recommending and implementing proposals to resolve problems
- Experience with Java build pipeline (Maven, Bamboo/Jenkins, Artifactory)
- Knowledge of git, and git workflows (git-flow, branching/merging, TBD, etc)
- Experience in Linux Administration (RHEL)
- Experience with automation/configuration management using Chef or equivalent
- Experience with cloud IaaS/PaaS and container orchestration platforms (Azure and K8S)
- Experience with SQL language;
- A working understanding of scripting languages (shell as a must, Python/Ruby - nice to have);
- Experience with Atlassian suite (Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket);
- Experience with containers and build pipelines relevant to them (Docker, Packer, Jenkins pipelines to utilize them)
- Experience with application servers (WildFly, WebSphere - nice to have)
- Experience with monitoring tools (ELK, Dynatrace - nice to have)
- Good communication, interpersonal, intuitive skills with an ability to work efficiently in both independent and team work environments
- Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Mathematics
- Good knowledge of English

Responsibilities:

- Provide release and application support for developers and QA across the IT organization
- Act in accordance with DevOps roadmap, implementing solutions related to automation of building, integrating and deployment of software to the cloud, containerized and on-premise environments
- Take part in daily activities to ensure stability and operability of environments and application stack, provisioned to developers and QA
- Provide release support in accordance with release calendar

company.name: GlobalLogic
company.description:
GlobalLogic is a leader in digital product engineering services. 

We help our clients design and build innovative products, platforms, and digital experiences for the modern world. By integrating strategic design, complex engineering, and vertical industry expertise -- we help our clients imagine what’s possible and accelerate their transition into tomorrow

project.description:
Our customer is the largest retail pharmacy, health and daily living destination across the USA and Europe. It is a global leader in pharmacy-led, health and wellbeing retail and, together with the companies in which it has equity method investments, has over 13,200 stores in 11 countries as well as one of the largest global pharmaceutical wholesale and distribution networks, with over 390 distribution centers delivering to more than 230,000 pharmacies, doctors, health centers and hospitals each year in more than 20 countries.

GlobalLogic is looking for a new talent to join our rapidly growing team established for worldwide retail pharmacy company. Our teams are co-located with the customer in Deerfield, IL. We deliver various services in this strategic partnership to build a new pharmacy platform: Product architecture and development, Integration, DevOps, User Experience and Design, Agile coaching.
project.name: Senior Devops Engineer

matched_jobs.title: Senior Maual Test Engineer
matched_jobs.description:
Requirements:

- 4+ years of work experience in software testing (enterprise applications is a plus)
- Functioned as team-lead on QA projects, leading small teams of 3-5 resources.
- Highly experienced with QA methodologies, processes and tools
- Experience setting up quality processes/driving quality initiatives on a project level
- Strong understanding of web-based technologies
- Excellent understanding of quality assurance and product quality
- Ability to perform tests against Web applications, both front-end UI as well as back-end databases, application servers, and services
- Ability to plan, coordinate, and execute a testing strategy
- Strong knowledge of SQL and relational theory
- Upper intermediate level of English in both writing and speaking
- Self-starter with excellent communication and interpersonal skills, as well as a strong attention to detail

Responsibilities:

- Provide functional and technical expertise within a product domain area
- Anticipate risksimpact associated with feature development
- Work as a full partner with the development team to include all hooks and debug tools that will help to drive quality.
- Participate in all planning and estimation practices.
- Create and execute test strategies with an emphasis on balancing the need for thorough documentation of tests with the need to move quickly and agilely
- Produce status reports and quality metrics
- Contribute to establishing, revising and verifying quality standards, processes, and procedures.
- Сreate and analyze testing artifacts - test plans, test cases, and user scenarios.
- Maintain pre-existing (regression) test cases to keep current as new enhancements are introduced.
- Interact with the customer regarding ongoing activities (possible business trips to US)
- Mentoring newcomers or junior grades
- Lead a Scrum QA team (2-4), onboard newcomers and provide training to junior grades
- Suggest and provide leadership on implementing QA process enhancements.

company.name: GlobalLogic
company.description:
GlobalLogic is a leader in digital product engineering services. 

We help our clients design and build innovative products, platforms, and digital experiences for the modern world. By integrating strategic design, complex engineering, and vertical industry expertise -- we help our clients imagine what’s possible and accelerate their transition into tomorrow

project.description:
The goal of the project is to create a highly scalable, multi-tenanted Global Payments platform capable of being hosted which will allow us to deliver payments solutions. The project has 2 identified phases with the initial focus on EMEA Payments requirements for a ‘cloud’ option for our customer base (approx. 10k customers with multiple users) and the delivery of a global foundation for us to build upon. The second phase builds upon the foundations and delivers other global products.

We are a young and enthusiastic team, tightly integrated with the Customer and empowered for business and technical decisions. We support flexibility with working hours and always find time to have some fun. There are always many challenges and opportunities to grow.
project.name: Senior Manual Test Engineer
